itunes:title: #84 - Little Steps to Big Change with Katie Lee
title: #84 - Little Steps to Big Change with Katie Lee
description:
Today we're talking to lifestyle designer and self-published author, Katie Lee, all about how to design a beautiful, simplified everyday life that helps you feel more satisfied, fulfilled, and ultimately—boss! We're also digging into what it takes to self-publish a book and what you can learn about yourself and your business through the book writing process.-Your daily life is your whole life philosophy (6:42)-Methodical approach to simplifying your life (10:52)-How to make the daily grind more beautiful (15:00)-How to continually live with gratitude and not become desensitized (20:21)-Creating a home and life that supports your dreams and goals (25:38)-How to keep from getting overwhelmed when you're embracing change (41:48)-Self-publishing a book (50:20)

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Follow Being Boss on Instagram: @beingbossclub

Join the Being Boss Community: beingboss.club/community
content:encoded:
Today we're talking to lifestyle designer and self-published author, Katie Lee, all about how to design a beautiful, simplified everyday life that helps you feel more satisfied, fulfilled, and ultimately—boss! We're also digging into what it takes to self-publish a book and what you can learn about yourself and your business through the book writing process.-Your daily life is your whole life philosophy (6:42)-Methodical approach to simplifying your life (10:52)-How to make the daily grind more beautiful (15:00)-How to continually live with gratitude and not become desensitized (20:21)-Creating a home and life that supports your dreams and goals (25:38)-How to keep from getting overwhelmed when you're embracing change (41:48)-Self-publishing a book (50:20)
